node.excerpt: Some time back I came across an Interesting story about Landau while reading Quanta Magazine. Landau once suffered a serious automobile accident that put in a comma for more than a month. So one day his son came to visit him and instead of exchanging compliments Landau asked him to find the indefinite integral of   over  .
